package.name: adapy
package.description: Python library for interacting with ADA through OpenRAVE. ADA is an "Assistive Dextrous Arm" developed by the Personal Robotics Lab at Carnegie Mellon University, intended for helping elderly people and those with disabilities. The system is composed of a Kinova Mico arm for manipulation accompanied by several sensors for perception and world modeling.
package.author: Stefanos Nikolaidis
